com.scalar.db.api

Interface DistributedTransactionManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsensusCommitManager, TransactionService

    public interface DistributedTransactionManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes connections to the cluster.
      TransactionState getState(java.lang.String txId)
      Returns the state of a given transaction.

      Starts a new transaction.

      Starts a new transaction with the specified Isolation level.

      Starts a new transaction with Serializable isolation level and the specified SerializableStrategy.

      Starts a new transaction with the specified transaction ID.

      • start

        DistributedTransaction start()
        Starts a new transaction.
        Returns:
        DistributedTransaction

      • start

        DistributedTransaction start(java.lang.String txId)
        Starts a new transaction with the specified transaction ID. It is users' responsibility to guarantee uniqueness of the ID so it is not recommended to use this method unless you know exactly what you are doing.
        Parameters:
        txId - an user-provided unique transaction ID
        Returns:
        DistributedTransaction

      • start

        DistributedTransaction start(Isolation isolation)
        Starts a new transaction with the specified Isolation level.
        Parameters:
        isolation - an isolation level
        Returns:
        DistributedTransaction

      • start

        DistributedTransaction start(java.lang.String txId,
                             Isolation isolation)
        Starts a new transaction with the specified transaction ID and Isolation level. It is users' responsibility to guarantee uniqueness of the ID so it is not recommended to use this method unless you know exactly what you are doing.
        Parameters:
        txId - an user-provided unique transaction ID
        isolation - an isolation level
        Returns:
        DistributedTransaction

      • start

        DistributedTransaction start(Isolation isolation,
                             SerializableStrategy strategy)
        Starts a new transaction with the specified Isolation level and SerializableStrategy. If the isolation is not SERIALIZABLE, the serializable strategy is ignored.
        Parameters:
        isolation - an isolation level
        strategy - a serializable strategy
        Returns:
        DistributedTransaction

      • start

        DistributedTransaction start(SerializableStrategy strategy)
        Starts a new transaction with Serializable isolation level and the specified SerializableStrategy.
        Parameters:
        strategy - a serializable strategy
        Returns:
        DistributedTransaction

      • start

        DistributedTransaction start(java.lang.String txId,
                             SerializableStrategy strategy)
        Starts a new transaction with the specified transaction ID, Serializable isolation level and the specified SerializableStrategy. It is users' responsibility to guarantee uniqueness of the ID so it is not recommended to use this method unless you know exactly what you are doing.
        Parameters:
        txId - an user-provided unique transaction ID
        strategy - a serializable strategy
        Returns:
        DistributedTransaction

      • start

        DistributedTransaction start(java.lang.String txId,
                             Isolation isolation,
                             SerializableStrategy strategy)
        Starts a new transaction with the specified transaction ID, Isolation level and SerializableStrategy. It is users' responsibility to guarantee uniqueness of the ID so it is not recommended to use this method unless you know exactly what you are doing. If the isolation is not SERIALIZABLE, the serializable strategy is ignored.
        Parameters:
        txId - an user-provided unique transaction ID
        isolation - an isolation level
        strategy - a serializable strategy
        Returns:
        DistributedTransaction

      • getState

        TransactionState getState(java.lang.String txId)
        Returns the state of a given transaction.
        Parameters:
        txId - a transaction ID
        Returns:
        TransactionState

      • close

        void close()
        Closes connections to the cluster. The connections are shared among multiple services such as StorageService and TransactionService, thus this should only be used when closing applications.
